description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing ReminderSchedule entities, providing a method to find active reminder schedules by partner.

classes.name: ReminderScheduleRepository
classes.description: A repository interface extending JpaRepository to perform database operations on ReminderSchedule entities with custom query method findByPartnerAndActiveTrue.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndActiveTrue
methods.description: Custom method to retrieve a list of active ReminderSchedule entities associated with a specific Partner.
